name: 21-gun Salute
description: Deploy 7 Troops. Each troop you have deals 3 damage to your opponent.

immediateEffect.script: if (!State.ContainsKey("troops")) State["troops"] = 0; State["troops"] = (int)State["troops"] + 7; int troops = (int)State["troops"]; int damage = troops * 3; DealDamage(Opponent, damage);
